Push A.description: Primary horizontal push day emphasizing upper chest through incline pressing. Machine-based movements accommodate pec injury history — no free bar bench, stop at 90° elbow bend, never to failure on pressing. Secondary focus on anterior deltoids and tricep long head.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Incline Press
exercises.notes: 30-45° incline. Stop at 90° elbow. Control negative.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.notes: Squeeze at contraction. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover (Low to High)
exercises.notes: Upper chest emphasis. Hands meet at eye level.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Slight forward lean. Don't lock out.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Lead with elbow. Slight forward lean.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
exercises.notes: Long head emphasis. Full stretch overhead.

exercises.name: Rope Pushdown
exercises.notes: Split rope at bottom. Medial head focus.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: External rotation at top. Rear delt/rotator cuff.

Push B.description: Vertical push priority with overhead pressing as primary movement. Lower chest work via high-to-low cables. Includes rear delt work via reverse pec deck and dips for tricep mass. Reduced chest volume compared to Push A.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Slight incline on bench. Bar to chin level.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Controlled negatives. No swinging.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover (High to Low)
exercises.notes: Lower chest emphasis. Hands meet at navel.

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.notes: Secondary chest volume. Moderate intensity.

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck
exercises.notes: Rear delt isolation. Squeeze at contraction.

exercises.name: Assisted Dips
exercises.notes: Upright torso for triceps. Negative = assistance weight.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
exercises.notes: Long head emphasis.

exercises.name: Reverse Grip Pushdown
exercises.notes: Medial head emphasis. Underhand grip.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Rear delt and external rotation.

Pull A.description: Heavy hip hinge day with conventional deadlift as primary strength movement. Vertical pulling for lat width development. Bicep work focuses on peak (standard curls) and brachialis (hammer curls). 72hr minimum before any posterior chain work.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: Conventional stance. Reset each rep. Belt optional 275+.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown (Wide Grip)
exercises.notes: Wide overhand. Pull to upper chest. Slight lean back.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row (Wide Grip)
exercises.notes: Wide grip for upper back thickness. Row to lower chest.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.notes: Supinate at top. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Cable Hammer Curl
exercises.notes: Rope attachment. Brachialis emphasis.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Rear delt and rotator cuff health.

Pull B.description: Horizontal rowing emphasis for mid-back thickness and trap development. No deadlift — allows this workout 48hr after Pull A if needed. Bicep work targets long head (incline curls) and forearms (reverse curls).

exercises.name: Smith Bent Over Row
exercises.notes: 45° torso angle. Pull to lower chest. Squeeze lats.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown (Close Grip)
exercises.notes: Neutral close grip. Full stretch at top.

exercises.name: Straight Arm Pulldown
exercises.notes: Lat isolation. Keep arms straight. Hinge slightly.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shrug
exercises.notes: Straight up and down. Hold at top 1 sec.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
exercises.notes: 45° incline. Long head stretch. No swinging.

exercises.name: Cable Reverse Curl
exercises.notes: Brachioradialis and forearm development.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.notes: Rear delt and rotator cuff.

Legs A.description: Quad-dominant leg day with leg press as primary compound (low foot position for quad bias). Includes leg curl for hamstring balance. High volume leg extensions for quad isolation. Calves and abs to finish.

exercises.name: Leg Press (Feet Low)
exercises.notes: Feet low and narrow for quad bias. Don't lock knees.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.notes: Pause at top. Control negative. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Hip Adductor
exercises.notes: Inner thigh. Pause at contraction.

exercises.name: Hip Abductor
exercises.notes: Glute medius. Control the weight.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Full stretch at bottom. Pause at top.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Crunch ribs to hips. Don't pull with arms.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Control swing. Curl pelvis up.

Legs B.description: Hamstring and glute dominant day. Smith RDL as primary hip hinge (72hr after deadlift). High foot position leg press for glute/ham bias. Heavy leg curls. Maintains quad stimulus via higher position leg press.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (Smith)
exercises.notes: Slight knee bend. Push hips back. Feel hamstring stretch.

exercises.name: Leg Press (Feet High)
exercises.notes: Feet high and wide for glute/ham bias.

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.notes: Primary hamstring isolation. Full ROM.

exercises.name: Hip Adductor
exercises.notes: Adductor magnus assistance.

exercises.name: Hip Abductor
exercises.notes: Glute medius. Hip stability.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Match Legs A volume for symmetry.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Core stability for heavy compounds.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Lower ab emphasis. Replace plank for better development.

Rest.description: Active recovery day. Light stretching, foam rolling, or walking encouraged. No resistance training. Sleep 8+ hours. Hydration focus.
